page.title: 12Calbourne Recreation Areas
page.content: The{RECREATION CENTRE, PLAYING FIELD and{TENNIS COURTS,}were built through local fund raising and Council grants. The{Recreation Centre}is a large extension to the Village Reading Room and consists of a Hall, Billiard Room, Kitchen, Bar Facilities and Changing Rooms with showers and toilets. A Committee of Management run the Centre and arrange various activities during the year. The Hall is used by, the Dance Club, Choir, Womens Institute, Toddler Group, Cricket and Football Clubs. It is also available for hire for private functions. Within the {Playing Field}boundary are Cricket and Football pitches, a Tennis court and childrens area. Both cricket and football are played regulary during their seasons and tennis on the hard court throughout the year.The play area has swings,climbing frame & slide
